item.title: Publications
item.description: My complete CV is here. Also, check out my Google Scholar page. – PDF, – data and code Working papers Sobchuk O, Youngblood M, Morin O. First-mover advantage in music, in review, EPJ Data Science Dubourg E, Thouzeau V, et al. The cognitive foundations of fictional stories, in review, Psychology Review Sobchuk, O, Šeļa, A (accepted). Computational thematics: Comparing algorithms for clustering the genres of literary fiction, Humanities and Social Sciences Communications Publications Sobchuk O (2023) Evolution of modern literature and film.
